item.title: There Is No Way To Moderate Transgenderism. It Must Be Destroyed
item.description: A New York Times author quietly made a series of admissions that, only a few years ago, would have been dismissed as reactionary bigotry.

item.title: Securing Justice For Russiagate Is How We Save The Country
item.description: Let us hope that Pam Bondi has the courage to stay the course and prosecute lawbreakers to the full extent of the law — wherever in the deep state rul...

item.title: Jim Lovell Overcame Extreme Adversity In ‘NASA’s Finest Hour’
item.description: For the past 55 years, Jim Lovell served as living proof of what man can accomplish when he puts his mind to it.

item.title: Politico Hacks Insist Gerrymandering Is Different When Democrats Do It
item.description: Svirnovskiy's framing is clear: He wants readers to view the Texas Republican effort as illegitimate precisely because Trump supports it.

item.title: Democrats Promise To Turn Illegal Aliens Into Voters
item.description: There's a host of issues with giving illegal aliens citizenship or legal status or a carveout -- but the most consequential is voting.
